title: what type
content:
type?

 [‹ Upright script (Feel Script)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121151421/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43919 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for similar font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121151421/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43899 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ch m williams

comments.content: Sorry Flo, are you referring to me or to him? Or both? sigh.

Hi Patch, if I had referred to you, I would also have to point the finger at myself, no? ;-)  
And I wasn’t really serious anyway.

I wonder if there isn’t a bug in posting images. Seems there have been quite a few problems lately. Williams, make sure it is an RGB JPG if you are using the “insert image” feature.

And you two, stop fooling around so much! ;^P
